tha-ap186:2.4: paggaṇhiṃ vatasiddhiyā → puttomhi hitasiddhiyā (sya1ed, sya2ed); mūgomhi vata siddhiyā (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap186:3.3: Buddharaṃsīhi phuṭṭhosmi → buddharaṃsyābhiphuṭṭhomhi (bj); buddharaṃsīhi phuṭṭhomhi (sya1ed, sya2ed); buddharaṃsābhighuṭṭhomhi (pts-vp-pli1); buddharaṃsābhighuṭṭhosmi (mr)
